DocWhereRule.Name: WR31
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The _Item_ that is styled by an _IfcAnnotationSurfaceOccurrence_ relation shall be (if provided) a subtype of _IfcSurface, IfcSolidModel, IfcShellBasedSurfaceModel, IfcFaceBasedSurfaceModel_. > NOTE  If no Item is provided, the IfcAnnotationSurfaceOccurrence is used to provide a surface style to a material dependent presentation.
